settings.text: Get Answers to Your Burning Questions in our Extensive FAQ Database

settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
What are the shipping charges in India?
settings.answer:
We offer affordable shipping across India:

  • Free Shipping: On orders above ₹999 across India
  • Standard Shipping: ₹99 for orders below ₹999
  • Express Shipping: ₹199 (Metro cities), ₹299 (Non-metro cities)
  • Cash on Delivery: Additional ₹50 charges apply

settings.title: How long does delivery take in India?
settings.answer:
Metro Cities (Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Chennai, Kolkata, Hyderabad, Pune):

  • Standard: 2-4 business days
  • Express: 1-2 business days

Tier-2 Cities (Ahmedabad, Surat, Jaipur, Lucknow, Kanpur, Nagpur, Indore, Bhopal):

  • Standard: 3-5 business days
  • Express: 2-3 business days

Other Cities/Towns:

  • Standard: 4-7 business days
  • Express: 3-5 business days

settings.title: Which courier partners do you use?
settings.answer:
We partner with India's most reliable logistics providers:

  • Delhivery - Primary partner for pan-India delivery
  • Blue Dart - Express deliveries
  • DTDC - Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities
  • India Post - Remote locations and COD orders

settings.title: Can I track my order?
settings.answer:
Yes! Once your order is dispatched, you'll receive:

  • SMS with tracking number
  • Email with tracking link
  • WhatsApp updates (if opted in)
  • Track through your Teevore account dashboard

settings.title: Can I change my delivery address after ordering?
settings.answer:
Address changes are possible only if:

  • Request made within 2 hours of order placement
  • Order hasn't been dispatched yet
  • Contact us immediately at support@teevore.com or WhatsApp: +91-7827232156

settings.title: Do you deliver to remote areas in India?
settings.answer: Yes, we deliver across India including remote areas through India Post and regional courier partners. Delivery may take 7-10 business days for very remote locations.

settings.title: What materials do you use?
settings.answer:
We use premium, sustainable materials:

  • 100% Cotton: Soft, breathable, pre-shrunk
  • Cotton Blends: 60% cotton, 40% polyester for durability
  • Bio-washed Cotton: Extra soft finish, reduced shrinkage
  • Organic Cotton: Eco-friendly, GOTS certified options
  • Fleece: 280 GSM, pill-resistant

settings.title: How do I choose the right size?
settings.answer:
Use our detailed size chart available on each product page:

  • Chest measurements in inches and cm
  • Length and shoulder measurements included
  • Model specifications mentioned for reference
  • Size guide recommendations based on fit preference
  • Contact support for personalized size suggestions

settings.title: Can I pre-order upcoming collections?
settings.answer:
Yes! Pre-orders are available for:

  • New collection launches
  • Limited edition drops
  • Seasonal collections
  • Collaborative pieces

Pre-order benefits include early access and special pricing.

settings.title: Can I place multiple orders and combine shipping?
settings.answer:
Unfortunately, we cannot combine separate orders. To avoid multiple shipping charges:

  • Add all items to cart before checkout
  • Orders placed within 30 minutes can sometimes be combined (contact support immediately)

settings.title: Do you offer gift options?
settings.answer:
Yes, we provide:

  • Gift wrapping: ₹99 per item
  • Personalized message cards: Free
  • Gift receipts: Without price information
  • Digital gift cards: Available in multiple denominations

settings.title: Returns & Refunds
How do I return an item?
settings.answer:
Easy 3-step return process:

  1. Initiate Return: Login to your account > Orders > Return
  2. Schedule Pickup: Choose convenient pickup slot
  3. Quality Check: Refund processed within 3-5 business days

settings.title: What items cannot be returned?
settings.answer:
Non-returnable items include:

  • Items used, washed, or damaged by customer
  • Products without original tags or packaging
  • Innerwear and personal care items (hygiene reasons)
  • Items damaged due to misuse
  • Products altered or customized

settings.title: How long does refund take?
settings.answer:
Refund timelines:

  • Online Payments: 3-5 business days after quality check
  • Cash on Delivery: Bank transfer within 7-10 business days
  • Store Credit: Instant (if opted for faster resolution)
  • Wallet Refund: 24-48 hours

settings.title: Can I exchange instead of return?
settings.answer:
Yes! We offer free exchanges for:

  • Size exchanges: Within same product
  • Color exchanges: Subject to availability
  • Style exchanges: For products of equal or higher value

settings.title: Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer:
Can I cancel my order?

Order cancellation is possible:

  • Before dispatch: 100% refund, cancellation via account dashboard
  • After dispatch: Return process applies
  • COD orders: Can be refused at delivery

settings.title: Product Care
How should I care for my Teevore apparel?
settings.answer:
T-Shirts & Polos:

  • Machine wash in cold water (30°C max)
  • Turn inside out before washing
  • Use mild detergent, avoid bleach
  • Air dry or tumble dry on low heat
  • Iron inside out if needed

Hoodies & Full Sleeves:

  • Wash in cold water with similar colors
  • Use gentle cycle for fleece items
  • Avoid fabric softeners on technical fabrics
  • Reshape while damp and air dry
  • Steam instead of ironing fleece

General Care Tips:

  • Wash dark and light colors separately
  • Pre-treat stains immediately
  • Store on hangers to maintain shape
  • Follow care labels on each garment

settings.title: Payments & Security
What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer:
We accept all major payment options:

Online Payments:

  • Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, RuPay, Amex)
  • Debit Cards (all major banks)
  • Net Banking (all major banks)
  • UPI (Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, Amazon Pay)
  • Digital Wallets (Paytm, Mobikwik, Freecharge)
  • Buy Now Pay Later (Simpl, Lazypay, ZestMoney)

Offline Payments:

  • Cash on Delivery (COD) - Additional ₹50 charge
  • Bank Transfer/NEFT (for bulk orders)

settings.title: Is online payment safe on Teevore?
settings.answer:
Absolutely! Your payment security is our priority:

  • SSL Encryption: 256-bit encryption for all transactions
  • PCI DSS Compliant: Industry-standard security protocols
  • Razorpay Integration: Trusted payment gateway
  • No Card Details Stored: We don't store your payment information
  • Fraud Protection: Advanced fraud detection systems

settings.title: Why was my payment declined?
settings.answer:
Common reasons for payment failure:

  • Insufficient funds or exceeded daily limit
  • Incorrect card details or expired card
  • Bank's security restrictions for online transactions
  • Technical issues with payment gateway

Solutions:

  • Verify card details and try again
  • Enable international transactions if required
  • Contact your bank for transaction approval
  • Try alternative payment method

settings.title: Account & Customer Support
How do I create a Teevore account?
settings.answer:
Creating an account is simple:

  1. Click 'Sign Up' on homepage
  2. Enter Details: Email, phone number, password
  3. Verify Account: OTP verification via SMS
  4. Profile Setup: Add shipping addresses and preferences
  5. Start Shopping: Browse and enjoy member benefits

Account Benefits:

  • Faster checkout process
  • Order history and tracking
  • Wishlist and favorites
  • Exclusive member offers
  • Early access to sales

settings.title: How can I track my orders?
settings.answer:
Multiple tracking options available:

  • Account Dashboard: Login > My Orders > Track
  • Email Links: Click tracking link in dispatch email
  • SMS Updates: Automatic delivery updates
  • WhatsApp: Real-time status updates
  • Customer Support: Call/chat for live tracking

settings.title: How do I contact customer support?
settings.answer:
We're here to help 24/7:

Preferred Contact Methods:

  • WhatsApp: +91-XXXXXXXXX (Fastest response)
  • Email: support@teevore.com
  • Live Chat: Available on website 9 AM - 9 PM
  • Phone: +91-7827232156 (9 AM - 7 PM, Mon-Sat)

Response Times:

  • WhatsApp: Within 30 minutes
  • Live Chat: Immediate
  • Email: Within 4-6 hours
  • Phone: Immediate

settings.title: What support can I get?
settings.answer:
Our customer service team helps with:

  • Order-related queries and modifications
  • Size and fit guidance
  • Return and exchange assistance
  • Payment and refund issues
  • Product information and care instructions
  • Styling advice and recommendations
  • Account management support
  • Feedback and complaints resolution

settings.title: How do I subscribe to newsletters and offers?
settings.answer:
Stay updated with Teevore:

  • Website Subscription: Footer newsletter signup
  • Account Preferences: Enable notifications in account settings
  • WhatsApp Updates: Opt-in during checkout
  • SMS Alerts: Get sale and launch notifications

What You'll Receive:

  • New collection launches
  • Exclusive member discounts
  • Flash sales and limited offers
  • Styling tips and fashion trends
  • Early access to seasonal collections

settings.title: How do I unsubscribe from communications?
settings.answer:
Easy unsubscribe options:

  • Email: Click unsubscribe link in any email
  • SMS: Reply 'STOP' to any promotional SMS
  • WhatsApp: Send 'STOP' message
  • Account Settings: Disable notifications in preferences
  • Contact Support: Request complete unsubscription
